thread.section_title: Dance Review News | Wall Street Journal
thread.title: A Display of Dance’s Variety

author: Robert Greskovic
title: A Display of Dance’s Variety

organizations.name: display of dance’s variety new york

text:
New York
For a third year now, the Joyce Theater is presenting a series called American Dance Platform, which features groups from around the U.S. in shared programs offering a selection of dance of different varieties. This year’s installment offers eight companies from New York, California, Illinois, Pennsylvania and Hawaii making up four different bills, all programmed by Christine Tschida, director of Northrop, the dance and theater presenting organization at the University of Minnesota.
...
